comments:
I have no idea how I got it to throw up on me but a NullPointerException when renaming a file in the Java perspective should be sufficient grounds for a bug.   Rename: right-click on a resource, Refactor -> Rename. Same operation works without a hitch in the Resource perspective. I am on 3.2 M4 (eclipse.buildId=I20051215-1506) with JDK 1.4.2_06.
